metadata.dc:author: Espejo Romero, H
Delgado Godos, A
González Rojas, M
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of gastric trichobezoar in a pediatric patient who had trichotillomania and trichophagia, in whom a gastric ulcer was found in a barium radiograph and confirmed at surgery, when the trichobezoar was extracted. We review the different clinical features of this strange clinical entity.
metadata.dc:title: Tricobezoar y úlcera gástrica en pediatría: reporte de 1 caso.
[Trichobezoar and gastric ulcer in pediatrics: a case report].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
